did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Mildred Taitt Milton, 1879-1963, was a teacher and the wife of Jefferson Davis Milton, Arizona lawman. The collection includes letters, marriage book, and a scrapbook; chiefly letters from Milton to her husband, Jefferson Davis Milton, 1919-1920.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Letters, marriage book, and a scrapbook; chiefly letters from Milton to her husband, Jefferson Davis Milton, 1919- 1920. Also included are a letter from Mildred to her sister Mrs. J.O. Sheldon; two letters to Milton from former associates, 1936-1937; marriage book, June 30, 1919; a scrapbook kept while a student at Vassar College, 1900-1901; and 16 photographs of family and friends.
